mapper.insert: -- insert into t_seckill_order(productid, payamount, userid, transquantity, merchantid, createtime, paystatus, recevingaddress, recevingphone, recevingname, transserial) -- value -- (#{productId}, #{payAmount}, #{userId}, #{transQuantity}, #{merchantId}, #{createTime}, #{payStatus}, #{recevingAddress}, #{recevingPhone}, #{recevingName}, #{transSerial}) insert into t_seckill_order(transserial, productid, merchantid, productid, payamount, transquantity, createtime, paytime, paystate, receivingaddress, receivingphone, recivingname) value (#{transserial}, #{productId}, #{merchantId}, #{productId}, #{payAmount}, #{transQuantity}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{payState}, #{receivingAddress}, #{receivingPhone}, #{recivingName})
